column2: Life in Babylon has always been difficult for the Rastafari faithful, and it has only gotten worse in recent times. The Enlightened and the Ras Tafari have been pushed underground, forced to hide themselves from the authorities under penalty of imprisonment or even death, grounding and partaking of holy herb only in private homes and hidden places. One day they will escape to the Promised Land of Ethiope, in the paradise of Africa beyond the sea.
The §YRastafarian§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Rastafarian faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: The High Priest, leading the international effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: Since the Voodoo religion first arrived in the New World, its followers have been persecuted and repressed by corrupt and hypocritical religious authorities. Now, the Voodoo faithful are once again forced to hide their interactions with the spirits until the day comes when they can once more venerate Bondye openly.
The §YVoodoo§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Voodoo faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: The practice of Santería relies on colors, numbers, and gifts - not names. The Orichá have been called by other names before, and if it is necessary to call them by another name now, so be it. The Orichá - or the Saints, if you prefer - can still be propitiated within the context of another religion, even if the rituals themselves must be conducted behind closed doors. It is not the first time this has happened, and probably not the last either, but even so the faithful long for a day when they may venerate Olodumaré and the Orichás openly.
The §YSantería§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Santería faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: Since the religion of Candomblé first emerged in the New World, its followers have been persecuted and repressed by corrupt and hypocritical religious authorities. column2: The Tres Potencias and the many courts of María Lionza may be shunned by those who know no better, but the devoted still respect the three powers. In this time of persecution,  and pay special attention to la Corte Libertadora, those mighty spirits lead by Simón Bolívar who fought oppression before and will some day - perhaps some day very soon - help to do so again.
The §YTres Potencias§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column2: Before Old America won its independence from the Redcoats, true patriots were forced to hide their devotion to the Founding Fathers or be sent to the gallows. Those dark days have descended once again, but true Americanist patriots will not be deterred. They will once again rise up and overthrow the tyrannical rule of their oppressors...
The §YAmericanist§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column2: The Ghost Dance, or in the ancient tongue "Nanissáanah" reached its current form when the power of the spirits was invoked to combat foreign enemies. But sometimes war is not the most expedient, and those who practice the Dance in secret hope that the spirits will bless them and destroy their enemies in subtler ways than on the battlefield.
The §YNanissáanah§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Nanissáanah patriots have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: A High Priest in the hidden Nanissáanah society

Before Raven stole the Moon and placed it in the heavens, the world was shrouded in total darkness every night. The followers of Raven who find themselves shrouded in spiritual darkness must therefore band together and endeavor to steal authority in order to allow Xhúuyee K'iigaang to once more have a place in the sky where all can see.
The §YXhúuyee K'iigaang§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Xhúuyee K'iigaang patriots have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: Ever since its humble roots, Christians have marked themselves by their refusal to abandon their faith in the face of persecution. So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.
column3: Dès leurs humbles origines, les chrétiens ont refusé d'abandonner leur foi face à la persécution. Ainsi, une riche tradition de martyrs et de paroisses secrètes peut donner de l'espoir à des groupes de croyants, même dans les périodes les plus difficiles, peu importe la religion qu'ils sont obligés de professer publiquement. Entre eux, ils peuvent professer leur vraie foi en Dieu, et leur Dieu est amour.
column4: Seit ihren bescheidenen Anfängen haben sich Christen durch ihre beharrliche Weigerung hervorgetan, angesichts der Verfolgung von ihrem Glauben abzulassen. Daher kann eine lange Tradition von Märtyrern und Untergrundgemeinden Gruppen von Gläubigen selbst in den finstersten Zeiten Hoffnung geben, ganz gleich, was sie durch Zwang nach außen hin bekennen müssen. Untereinander können sie ihren wahren Glauben an Gott bekennen, und ihr Gott heißt Liebe.
column6: Desde sus humildes orígenes, los cristianos se han caracterizado por su negativa a abandonar su fe ante la opresión. Tanto es así, que una nutrida tradición de mártires y parroquias clandestinas consigue dar esperanza a grupos de creyentes incluso en los tiempos más oscuros, sin importar qué otra fe les obligan a profesar en público. Entre ellos pueden mostrar su verdadera fe en Dios, y su Dios es amor.

column2: The sarkic hordes fear true knowledge, and what they fear they endeavor to destroy. To prevent the destruction of knowledge, beleaguered Neo-Gnostics hide their books and other texts, taking them out to review only when entirely safe. But acquisition of further knowledge is very difficult alone, and so secret gnostics have long banded together in private offices, sharing their texts under the noses of more dominant religions.
The §YNeo-Gnostic§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Neo-Gnostic faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: The Pope in St. Louis claims authority of Rome by virtue of his backing in the New World. This backing makes it inconvenient to openly deny is primacy, but Catholics who see no moral infallibility in this false Pope find it useful to band together. Christianity is long rooted in joining hands against oppression, after all, especially when that oppression comes from an invalid Church.
The §YSedevacantist§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: The High Priest, leading the international effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: Ever since its humble roots, Christians have marked themselves by their refusal to abandon their faith in the face of persecution. So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.

column2: There have always been those who malign the Elder Ones and think that younger gods will be able to protect them. Those who have studied the writings of Alhazred, Lovecraft, and King know this to be foolish. These Occultists meet in secret, hiding their faces with hideous cowls with abnormal symbols adorning their accursed forms. Their blasphemous worship takes place in accursed halls and stygian boroughs, untraveled by Christian feet in indescribable aeons.
The §YOccultist§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Occultist faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: The power of the Holy Atom can not be seen, smelt, or heard, and only in its greatest manifestations can it be felt even as a slight warming. If the power of Atom need not be observed directly, what then of faith in the Atom? It too can be hidden, as secret Atomicists share their faith and seek out sources of the Atom's blessing to share with each other but conceal from the wider world.
The §YAtomicist§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Atomicist faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: The factories of the ancients sprawl endlessly, attesting the great might of the Omnissiah and his servants. Yet even so, rust cultists suffer oppression from those who see the artifacts of Ford and Vulcan as mere tools, as if they could be compared to items of mere human manufacture. The Forgotten keep their faith to themselves, but share it only with those of their own faith, though they look forward to a time when the machine spirits will revive the works of the ancients and they can break free from the creeping destruction of the Consuming Tarnish which envelops this world.
The §YRust Cult§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Rust Cult mechanists have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: The Invisible Hand of the Market

Their identities marked by hidden amulets with the sign of the Dollar, underground consumerist curates pray for the Invisible Hand to shelter and guide them against a harsh world as they propitiate the Almighty Dollar to spare them its wrath.

column2: Hidden Jewish communities have organized under oppression ever since the time of the Babylonian captivity. These groups welcome both those forced to convert away of Judaism, the Anusim, and those who have secretly become righteous converts, the ger tzedek. A community always cares for its own, knowing that as ages pass, true faith is worth persevering for. God will provide.
column3: Les communautés juives cachées se sont organisées sous l'oppression depuis l'époque de la captivité babylonienne. Ces groupes accueillent à la fois les juifs qui ont été forcés à se convertir, les Anoussim, et ceux qui se sont secrètement convertis, les ger tizedek. On peut toujours compter sur les membres de sa communauté, sachant qu'avec le temps qui passe, la vraie foi mérite qu'on lui reste fidèle. Dieu pourvoira.
column4: Seit der babylonischen Gefangenschaft haben sich in Zeiten der Unterdrückung versteckte jüdische Gemeinden organisiert. Diese Gruppen heißen sowohl die Anusim willkommen, die gezwungen wurden, sich vom Judentum abzuwenden, als auch die "ger tzedek", die heimlich zu rechtmäßigen Konvertiten geworden sind. Eine Gemeinde sorgt stets für ihre Angehörigen, da bekannt ist, dass im Lauf der Jahrhunderte wahrer Glaube es wert ist, standhaft an ihm festzuhalten. Gott wird für die Seinen sorgen.
column6: Comunidades judías secretas se han organizado bajo la opresión desde los tiempos del cautiverio de Babilonia. Estos grupos incluyen tanto a aquellos obligados a dejar la fe judía, los anusim, como a aquellos que han pasado a ser rectos conversos en secreto, los ger tzedek. Una comunidad siempre cuida de los suyos, sabiendo que con el paso del tiempo, vale la pena preservar la fe verdadera. Dios proveerá.

column2: Ever since Joseph Smith revealed the Book of Mormon, his followers have been shunned and despised by those who did not accept the new gospel. column2: The Japanese people and their faith have been discriminated against and persecuted by Americans for centuries. Today, true subjects of the Tenno are once again forced to hide their devotion in foreign lands, but this will not stop them from praising the true Emperor. Soon the gaijin will learn to respect the Kami...
The §YShinto§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Shinto faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: Aaargh, mateys. The landlubbers be crackin' down on us true sailors, preventin' us from collectin' Neptune's booty on the high seas. Nobody said bein' a pirate was easy! We'll lay low for now, and sail under false flags... but only 'til we can fly the Jolly Roger once more!

Soon, all will embrace the Light... or be struck down by the Angel of Death.

column2: Gaia's faithful are forced to live in secret, and their beliefs have been deemed radical and disruptive by an oppressive and destructive society. Although they are forced to participate in this society, true Gaians continue to live simple lives and tell others about Gaia's grace in secret. Hopefully, even these polluters can learn to respect the environment...
The §YGaian§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column2: Those who secretly follow the teachings of the Emperor focus on asceticism and shunning worldly possessions as much as they can without notice. A belief in rebirth into the circle of life makes them distance themselves of excess desire, which brings only pain. There are those who would rather plant a good karmic seed through rebirth than renounce Elton's teachings, as an open profession of faith is not always needed to grow closer to Nirvana.
column3: Ceux qui suivent secrètement les enseignements de Bouddha se concentrent sur l'ascétisme et s'éloignent des possessions de ce monde autant qu'ils le peuvent et sans délai. La croyance en la renaissance à travers la roue de la vie et de la mort les fait s'éloigner de toutes les envies qui n'apportent que la souffrance. Il y a ceux qui préfèrent planter une bonne graine karmique à travers la renaissance que de renoncer à ces enseignements, puisque la profession de foi n'est pas toujours nécessaire pour se rapprocher du Nirvana.
column4: Jene, die heimlich den Lehren von Buddha folgen, konzentrieren sich auf die Askese und das Entsagen von weltlichen Besitztümern, soweit dies möglich ist, ohne dass es auffällt. Der Glaube an die Wiedergeburt im Kreislauf von Leben und Tod bringt sie dazu, allen Begierden zu entsagen, die nur zu Leid führen. Manche ziehen es vor, lieber durch Wiedergeburt eine gute karmische Saat zu säen statt sich von diesen Lehren abzuwenden, da eine offene Bekennung zu diesem Glauben immer vorausgesetzt wird, um sich dem Nirwana zu nähern.
column6: Quienes siguen en secreto las enseñanzas de Buda se centran en el ascetismo y en distanciarse de las posesiones terrenales todo lo posible sin levantar sospechas. Creer en que renacerán en la rueda de la vida y la muerte los distancia de todo deseo, que trae sufrimiento. Hay quienes prefieren plantar una buena semilla del karma a través de la reencarnación que renunciar a estar enseñanzas, pues profesar abiertamente su fe no siempre es necesario para acercarse al nirvana.

column2: The §YCetic§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column2: The secret followers of Sol Invicta have little need for foreign faiths. The answer to every theological challenge and every moment of doubt is right in the sky above them, every day, without fail. It is what brings life and hope, deserving of every prostration. Just as Sol Invicta never fails to bring warmth to the earth and drive the Dark Father away, her followers will rise on the other side of their own long night.
column3: Les fidèles secrets de Zun ont peu besoin de croyances étrangères. La réponse à chaque défi théologique et chaque moment de doute est juste dans le ciel au-dessus d'eux, chaque jour, sans faute. C'est ce qui apporte la vie et l'espoir, méritant de toute prostration. Tout comme Zun ne manque jamais d'apporter la chaleur à la terre et de chasser la nuit, ses fidèles se lèveront après leur longue nuit.
column4: Die heimlichen Anhänger von Zun haben nur wenig Bedarf an fremden Religionen. Die Antwort auf jede theologische Herausforderung und jeden Augenblick des Zweifels steht jeden Tag und ohne jemals auszubleiben am Himmel über ihren Köpfen selbst geschrieben. Das ist es, was Leben und Hoffnung bringt und wofür sich jede Niederwerfung lohnt. Genau so, wie Zun immer wieder aufs Neue der Erde Wärme bringt und die Nacht vertreibt, erheben sich auch seine Anhänger auf der anderen Seite ihrer eigenen langen Nacht wieder.
column6: Los seguidores secretos de Zun no necesitan ninguna otra fe. La respuesta a toda cuestión teológica y a todo momento de duda se encuentra justo en el cielo que los cubre, cada día, sin falta. Es lo que les otorga la vida y la esperanza, merecedor de la postración de todos. Al igual que Zun nunca falla a la hora de repartir calor y ahuyentar la oscuridad, sus seguidores se alzarán al otro lado de su propia larga noche.

column2: The §YSol Invicta§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column2: The faithful Mictlantecs bravely worship their high God, the warrior Huitzilopochtli, despite being surrounded by colonists on every side. If they stay true and send him human sacrifices as gifts, he will lead them to a new dawn, a glorious reconquest of their ancient empire.
column3: Les fidèles aztèques adorent courageusement leur grand Dieu, le guerrier Huitzilopochtli, bien qu'entourés d'ennemis. S'ils lui restent fidèles et envoient des sacrifices humains, il les conduira à une nouvelle aurore, une conquête glorieuse du feu et du sang.
column4: Die gläubigen Azteken verehren tapfer ihren höchsten Gott, den Krieger Huitzilopochtli, obwohl sie auf allen Seiten von Feinden bedrängt werden. Wenn sie ihrem Glauben treu sind und ihm Menschenopfer darbringen, wird er sie zu einer neuen Morgendämmerung führen, einer glorreichen Eroberung von Feuer und Blut.
column6: Los fervientes aztecas veneran valerosamente a su dios, el guerrero Huitzilopochtli, a pesar de verse completamente rodeados por sus enemigos. Si mantienen su fe y le envían sacrificios humanos como obsequio, los liderará hasta un nuevo comienzo, una conquista gloriosa de fuego y sangre.
